    Cramer's V

    Cramer's V values range from 0 (no association) to 1 (full association), it is based on a nominal variation of Pearson's Chi-Square Test and is symmetrical.

    Spearman's Rank

    Spearman's Rank Correlation values range from -1 (perfect negative association) to 1 (perfect positive association).

    Theil's U

    Theil's U (Uncertainty Coefficient) quantifies the level of uncertainty reduction in one variable given knowledge of another. It is asymmetrical.

    Individual Correlations

    Individual correlations display relationships or associations between pairs of attributes.

    Alert!
